file_content.text: Don't know if you can read me, but I've arrived.
Perfect, and I just hit the jackpot--an exhaustive list of Revanite traitors on both fleets.
Signal's going to start breaking up soon. Talk to you when you get that jammer shut down.
Okay, you're in. There's a forcefield between you and that jammer. You'll have to gather a set of security codes to pass through.
I'll do what I can to guide you through, but that signal jammer might cause some hiccups.
